name: Invana Graph Explorer
description: Opensource Graph Data Visualiser for Tinkerpop supported Graph Databases.

BUILD_TYPE.description: `development` will retain the console logs, while `production` doesn't. Defaults to `development`

GREMLIN_SERVER_URL.description: Gremlin server url. eg: ws://127.0.0.1:8182/gremlin. Defaults to `ws://127.0.0.1:8182/gremlin`

PORT.description: Port on which ui server will start
